member.name: T:SySal.Executables.TSRClean.Exe
member.summary: TSRClean - Command line tool to clean TSR files.

remarks.para: The function of TSRClean is to clean TSR files of background. Only the volume tracks with a minimum number of segments, or those attached to vertices.
Usage: TSRClean <input Opera file> <output Opera file> <min track segments>

member.name: M:SySal.Executables.TSRClean.Exe.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
